comments.body: You don't need this here anymore right?
I'm wondering about the AllTypesMatch: that requires a strict equality between the types, but could one of them be statically sized while others have dynamic dimensions?

Here AllTypesMatch refers to the "start_indices", "limit_indices" & "strides".
They must be a 1-D vector in the same size, which is the rank of the input.
Plus, for a dynamic shape but static rank compiler, these tensors are infact static shaped 1-D tensor.

It may be worth adding a comment: `Expect these to be statically shaped and matching the rank of the input".

Can you add a verifier for the rank matching by the way?
Verification func for HLO_RealDynamicSliceOp is added and update its description.  Also we add verify(HLO_DynamicPadOp) .
